camera_and_perspective.view_angle: High-angle Drone Shot, 45Â° Bird's Eye View, Establishing Shot centering the main structure
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 24mm Wide-angle lens, Rectilinear projection, High sharpness, Minimal distortion
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharp details from foreground plaza to distant hazy mountains

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Bright Overcast, Mid-day (High Noon but cloudy)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: High-Key Lighting (bright flat light), Giant Softbox effect, Even global illumination, No harsh directional shadows
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Solid White Overcast Sky (Blown-out highlights), Hazy atmospheric perspective in background, Soft bright atmosphere
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Minimal soft ambient occlusion (AO) only, No distinct cast shadows, 'Clay Render' lighting feel

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Subtle warm tungsten glow (3000K) at the low floor of buildings, creating a focal point against the cool exterior
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural diffuse daylight reflecting on glass, emphasizing geometric forms without specular glare

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural flat daylight, Even illumination on buildings
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Soft ambient light on manicured lawns, vibrant but desaturated greens

color_and_grading.palette_theme: High-Key Minimalist, White/Grey dominant with desaturated Green accents, Clinical and Clean aesthetic
color_and_grading.temperature: Neutral Daylight (5500K) leaning towards Cool White, Clean White Balance
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low Contrast (Flat curve), Matte finish, Overexposed sky (Pure White #FFFFFF), High Clarity on architectural lines

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Corona Renderer (High-Albedo materials), V-Ray 6 (Dome Light only), Chaos Vantage
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Architectural Visualization, 'White Model' aesthetic with realistic textures, High-end Real Estate Photography
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Pristine textures, Sharp geometric edges, No atmospheric noise

environment_textures.ground_surface: Light grey facade with geometric layout, Manicured lawn strips, Clean concrete edges
environment_textures.foliage_style: Manicured urban landscaping, Young trees with sparse canopies, vibrant green grass
